name: Utpal
bio: I am a passionate videographer with a keen eye for detail. I love telling stories through the lens and capturing moments that last a lifetime. With over 5 years of experience, I have worked on various projects ranging from weddings to commercials.

experience.description: Working with various clients to deliver high-quality video content.
Led the post-production team and ensured timely delivery of projects.
Assisted in shooting documentaries and short films.
